dialogue.greeting: Oh it's you! I thought you were a ghost with how dark it is in here.
dialogue.already_greeted:
I'm trying to get into the control room to see what's going on.
 I think I can use a spare battery to override the door's emergency lock.
You should go check on Douglass and the Generator.
dialogue.already_talked: Go find Douglass and check on the generator!
dialogue.generator_fixed: Thank you for fixing the generator! I can finally get back to work.
